sellerCard.oneLiner: Pursuing Customer Satisfaction with Dedication and Honesty
sellerCard.description:
Kia Ora ðŸ‘‹, Hamad, a professional/seasoned freelance web developer with five years of experience in creating responsive websites, custom coding, fixing website issues, and adding new functionalities, like plugin - modules and themes. 


As they say, you'll never get tired if you love what you do, and I take pride in every project I work on.


Do you have any questions regarding your next project, feel free to text me, Let's plan your next project together and work with collaboration.

description.content:
Drupal 7 8 Website Creation, customization, updating, and Fixing Services!


About me:

Hello, I can design and develop your Drupal website from scratch and customize your theme or fix any issues in your pre-developed Drupal website, and also can upgrade your Drupal website to the latest version. 


I have experience in:


  1. Site building
  2. Fresh installation (7/8)
  3. Custom Development
  4. Maintenance / Site Backup
  5. Module or theme bug fixing
  6. Theme customization means (like demo setting)
  7. Migration from one server to another
  8. Update Modules and Upgrade Version
  9. Update using Drush or composer
  10. Major frequent updates per release


Why me?


i)  Quick turnaround

ii) Professional work

iii) Assuring customer satisfaction

iv) Well-designed work

v) performance-oriented

vi) Providing support after the task


  

Kindly contact me before placing an order to discuss your request with passion.


Really Looking forward to working with you.


Best Regards,

Hamad

questionsAndAnswers.question: Should i have to give both Cpanel and Drupal Site Credentials.
questionsAndAnswers.answer: For better results i recommend that both credentials are mandatory.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Would you can apply patches to my Drupal Theme or Module.
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes i can apply patches to your Drupal Module or Theme i use git for applying patches.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can You Update our Drupal Website to Latest Release
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes i can update your Drupal Website to Latest Security release , i can also updates Modules and configure .htaccess files

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you Configure our Drupal 8 Website.
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes i can install configure and fix Drupal 8 Latest Version.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you Customize Drupal 8 Theme
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! I can completely customize Drupal theme to meet your standards.

reviews.comment: Simply exceptional! The professionalism, availability, and service is outstanding. It is hard to find a good Drupal developer now days and he fixed the problem in no time. If you need help with Drupal look no further, he is the PROFESSIONAL you need!

seller_response.comment:
I wanted to take a moment to share my recent experience working with Luca. In a nutshell, it was exceptional. Luca was incredibly attentive to details, very prompt to providing the credentials and always there when i had a question.

He gave me the time I needed to fix the issue, overall it was a fantastic experience, and i look forward to our continued work and open to any custom code development related oppurtunity.

reviews.comment: Hamad K did an AMAZING job on the website! His attention to detail and professionalism are unmatched, and working with him was a breeze thanks to his deep understanding and excellent communication. ðŸ‘ Would 100% recommend!

seller_response.comment: Brilliant experience with Arthur as always, his SWIFT responses and deep understanding make the work a true joy, i look forward to our continued work.

reviews.comment: Working with Hamad K was a fantastic experience! He exceeded expectations with his code expertise and thorough documentation. He went above and beyond with an excellent understanding and quick responsivenessâ€”HIGHLY RECOMMEND! ðŸ™Œ

seller_response.comment:
I had the pleasure of collaborating with Mitchell and Alexander for Drupal project support, and it has been an exceptional experience. Their expertise and dedication to addressing complex challenges made the process seamless. Proactive communication and deep understanding of Drupal's ecosystem stood out, ensuring that all our requirements were met efficiently and with precision.

Driveâ€™s approach to problem-solving and their commitment to delivering high-quality solutions were truly impressive. I highly recommend Mitchell and Drive for any organization seeking reliable and professional Drupal support.

reviews.comment: Great job as usual. Thx again!

seller_response.comment: Excellent experience with Lynn on Drupal continued tickets, looking forward to more work together and open to likewise oppurtunities.

notableClients.name: AMARNA VIDA
notableClients.interaction_description: I had the pleasure of collaborating with Liliana on the design and development of the AMARNA Vida project in Drupal 9, which is an international organization dedicated to consciously fulfilling human and societal aspirations.

enriched_details.name: AMARNA Vida
enriched_details.description: Co-create with us a regeneration-driven world that goes beyond sustainability. Engage with yourself, others, your organisation, communities, and the planet.

notableClients.name: WaterWorks(WTRWRX)
notableClients.interaction_description: I got the opportunity to collaborate with the COO and Team WaterWorks on a Drupal 9 website migration of the project, where I implemented various custom features as per their requirements and ensured ongoing maintenance of the site.

enriched_details.name: WaterWorks
enriched_details.description: WaterWorks seeks to advance sustainable water solutions by introducing investors to technology companies and projects seeking capital at waterworksfund.com.

notableClients.name: MedicSignal
notableClients.interaction_description: As part of my work, I had the privilege of working on the MedicSignal website, its blog and subsidiary Checkin Party, and overseeing its migration from Azure to Cloud Hosting. Additionally, I perform ongoing maintenance of the projects.

enriched_details.name: MedicSignal
enriched_details.description: Avoid caregiver burnout, get support - don't waste precious energy.  What Lifeline doesn't do, we network when Mom can't respond; more than a fall detector.

notableClients.name: Fiverr
notableClients.interaction_description: Worked with Roei from Fiverr, on the in-depth Drupal Content Management System technical architecture and cross-mapping it against WordPress CMS, and segregating the differences in site-building, custom theming and plugin developments.

enriched_details.name: Fiverr
enriched_details.description: Fiverr's mission is to change how the world works together. Fiverr connects businesses with freelancers offering digital services in 300+ categories.

consultationData.description: Prior to commencing our discovery consultancy, I would appreciate a concise overview of the objectives we aim to achieve. Rest is assured that i'll get back to you on each point with details.
